member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Can't import this 'directB2S' file. Necessary infos are missing. Please update the 'directB2S' backglass file to a newer version..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Can not save this image file ('{0}')..

member.name: P:B2SBackglassDesigner.My.Resources.Resources.MSG_CheckB2SScoreTypes
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to You have added score displays without reel or LED type. Please set this type.
Maybe open menu item 'Reels & LEDs' -> 'Choose reel or LED types ...' first of all and select reel or LED types..

member.name: P:B2SBackglassDesigner.My.Resources.Resources.MSG_CheckB2SStartDigit
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Please check the 'B2S start digit' of the reel and/or LED score displays. There are overlapping digits.
Backglass can not be created right now..

member.name: P:B2SBackglassDesigner.My.Resources.Resources.MSG_CheckB2SStartDigit2
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Please check the 'B2S start digit' of the reel and/or LED score displays. There are overlapping digits.
Do you want to renumber all 'B2S start digit' right now?.

member.name: P:B2SBackglassDesigner.My.Resources.Resources.MSG_CheckB2SStartDigit3
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There were overlapping digits. All 'B2S start digit' entries are updated..

member.summary:

Do you have selected valid reels or LEDs for each score display?.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You have successfully imported the credit reel images..

member.summary:

To stop the import press 'Cancel' at the file selection dialog and answer with 'Yes' to the following two questions..

member.name: P:B2SBackglassDesigner.My.Resources.Resources.MSG_HowToSave1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The origin of this backglass data was a B2S backup file. Do you want to save it as a B2S backup once again?.

member.name: P:B2SBackglassDesigner.My.Resources.Resources.MSG_HowToSave2
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Okay, no B2S backup. Do you want to save it as the standard backglass data?
Please notice, you are overwriting your current backglass data. You can NOT undo this action..

member.name: P:B2SBackglassDesigner.My.Resources.Resources.MSG_ImportError
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to An error occurred loading the backglass file ('{0}').
Are you sure this is a valid 'directB2S' backglass file?.

member.name: P:B2SBackglassDesigner.My.Resources.Resources.MSG_ImportError2
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to An error occurred loading the backglass file ('{0}').
Maybe you have to update to a newer designer version..

member.name: P:B2SBackglassDesigner.My.Resources.Resources.MSG_ImportImages
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Import some images for background, illumination and/or DMD with the 'Images & layers' tool window. If you import more than one background image you can toggle between these background images. If you import illuminated images you can import yourself created illumination effects and use them in the backglass. If you import one or more DMD images you can use them as background or main picture of your DMD screen..

member.name: P:B2SBackglassDesigner.My.Resources.Resources.MSG_ImportWarning
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You're importing a newer 'directB2S' file of version {0} but your designer is version {1}. You can import this file but maybe you're missing some backglass infos and settings. Please update the designer to the newest version..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An IO error occurred during the backglass creation. Is the VisualStudio code of the current project opened already?.
